text: Consider a system with TLB, single level page table and virtual memory. Suppose that: TLB lookup time = 20 nanoseconds TLB hit ratio = 99% Memory access time = 100 nanoseconds Page fault rate = 0.05% Disk access time = 10 millisecond What is the total access time (in nanoseconds) if a page is not found in the TLB or the page table (assume that all pages currently in memory are dirty)?
